title: Standard patterns in choice-based games (2015)
dot:
digraph CYOA_Structures{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];subgraph cluster_1{label="CYOA Structures";style=dashed;TimeCave[label="Time Cave
- Heavily-branching
- Many endings
- Short playthroughs
- Open possibilities" shape=rect];Gauntlet[label="Gauntlet
- Linear central thread
- Ends in death or backtracking
- One main story" shape=rect];BranchAndBottleneck[label="Branch and Bottleneck
- Regular rejoining
- Heavy state-tracking
- Growth of player-character" shape=rect];Quest[label="Quest
- Distinct branches
- Modular structure
- Geography-focused" shape=rect];OpenMap[label="Open Map
- Reversible travel
- Static geography
- Extensive state-tracking" shape=rect];SortingHat[label="Sorting Hat
- Early heavy branching
- Major linear branches
- State-tracking" shape=rect];FloatingModules[label="Floating Modules
- No central plot
- Modular encounters
- Based on state" shape=rect];LoopAndGrow[label="Loop and Grow
- Central thread loops
- New options unlocked
- Emphasizes regularity" shape=rect];}TimeCave->Gauntlet[label="Can involve elements"];Gauntlet->BranchAndBottleneck[label="Can evolve into"];BranchAndBottleneck->Quest[label="Can share characteristics"];Quest->OpenMap[label="Exploration-focused"];SortingHat->FloatingModules[label="Different approaches"];LoopAndGrow->Gauntlet[label="Can co-exist with"];}
